lesson: Buying Clothes and Asking for Sizes

example.en: I need new clothing for summer.

words.definition: The measurement of a piece of clothing.
A space where you try on clothes.

example.en: The fitting room is over there.

words.definition: A period when goods are sold at lower prices.
words.arabic_definition: فترة يتم فيها بيع البضائع بأسعار أقل.

example.en: The shop is having a summer sale.

words.definition: The name of a company making clothes.
To wear a piece of clothing to see if it fits.
words.arabic_definition: يرتدي قطعة من الملابس ليرى إن كانت مناسبة.

example.en: May I try on this shirt?

words.definition: To give an item back to the shop.

example.en: I want to return this dress.

words.definition: To trade an item for another.

example.en: I exchanged the shirt for a larger size.

words.definition: Trying on clothes to check the size.

example.en: I am going for a fitting.

words.definition: A person working in a shop.

example.en: The clerk helped me find my size.
example.ar: ساعدني موظف المبيعات على العثور على مقاسي.
